author: phoinix
title: point-less!
review: i dont get this set....thow i got it :)  i dont understant the point of it...i got it for the orange parts of it...dosent look like a fish at all!the designer-creator sets look good only in big scale and not like this set!! good for the rare parts

author: bmwlego
title: Here Fishy Fishy Fishy!
review:
This little creator fish looks cool. The color scheme works and this fish would look pretty cool in a fish tank. Has any one put a LEGO creation in a fish tank for a decoration I wonder? What would happen to the bricks?

The eyes are a great use of the small radar dishes and 1 x 1 studs. The tail and flippers move with the use of jointed parts. This is a cute set and would have been great as a part of a larger set so that you could build a school of fish!

author: Alemas
title: I've got TWO(or three) of these!
review:
This is a cool set, with many orange, red, yellow, and green pieces! It even comes with instructions for the models!

Pros:

Looks cool
Nice assortment of colours
Instructions included

Cons:

You may need two of these sets for some of the inspiration models
Nothing else!

Overall, a cool set!
